summary: CONSUMER STATED THE BRAKE AND ABS LIGHT WOUL COME ON IMTERMITTENLY.  IT WAS SAID TO BE A COMMUNICATION PROBLEM (SINCE NEW).  THE BRAKES HAVE BEEN IN THE SHOP(DEALER)  MANY TIMES.  NOW THE BRAKES RELEASE AND COAST AT SLOW SPEED, AND ALMOST CAUSED TWO ACCIDENTS WHERE THE VEHICLE WOULD HAVE REAR ENDED ANOTHER.  THERE ARE ALSO COMPLAINTS WITH THE TIRES (INCOMPLETE INFO).
